AesGcmParams.summary: The AesGcmParams dictionary of the Web Crypto API represents the object that should be passed as the algorithm parameter into , , , or , when using the AES-GCM algorithm.

remarks.para: For details of how to supply appropriate values for this parameter, see the specification for AES-GCM: NIST SP800-38D, in particular section 5.2.1.1 on Input Data.
